project_info.programming_language: Python (primary backend with potential Torch Lightning for ML), JavaScript (minor frontend interactions)
project_info.target_user: Academic researcher specializing in ML and Music (music structure analysis)
project_info.original_requirements: Create a personalized, AI-guided productivity portal to drastically improve productivity and facilitate better research. Address two core pain points: 1) Sporadic idea capture requiring instant, effortless capture with timestamps and tags, and 2) Task prioritization struggles needing a clear single highest-priority task recommendation. Implement 'Rhythm & Rituals' model with Projects ‚Üí Milestones ‚Üí Tasks hierarchy, emphasizing participatory design and MVP-first approach.

product_goals.goal: Eliminate Cognitive Overhead Through Zero-Friction Capture
product_goals.description: Provide instant, effortless capture of sporadic ideas, insights, achievements, and pain points without interrupting deep work flow state, implementing the 'Immutable Log' pattern for comprehensive thought tracking.

product_goals.goal: Optimize Decision Making with AI-Guided Priority
product_goals.description: Present the single highest-priority task at any moment through intelligent recommendation system, directly answering 'What should I work on right now?' to eliminate choice paralysis and ensure concrete progress.

product_goals.goal: Enable Structured Flexibility Through Rhythm & Rituals
product_goals.description: Support the milestone-driven cadence (Projects ‚Üí Milestones ‚Üí Tasks) with 2-3 week cycles, balancing deadline-driven structure with creative research flexibility while incorporating AI-guided 'Knowledge Harvest' rituals for synthesis.
